title: Trellox
description: Trellox is an App inspired by Trello. Allows the user to create a board for project management, business, design, education, marketing, and more
techs: Vue.js, Vuex, Axios, Chart.js, Socket.io, SCSS, Mongodb, Express, Cors, Bcrypt, REST API

title: Cryptbits
description: With Cryptbits, you can transfer crypto coins. Additionally, you can view how the value of different crypto coins has changed over time
techs: React, React Router Dom, Redux & Redux Thunk, Axios, Chart.js, SASS, Local Storage

title: Cryptonites
description: An app that allows transfer of crypto coins to users. Using Node.js, Angular, and TypeScript

title: Google App
description: App that combines 2 of google apps- google notes and gmail

title: Meme Generator
description: An image maker that lets you add custom resizable text, images, and much more

title: Shani's Books
description: Colorful bookshop that allows the user to watch the book details. More features: filtering, adding new books to the store using external api

title: Cool Names
description: Allows getting data(probability, count and gender) about name
techs: React Typescript, React hooks, SCSS, Axios, Chart.js, HTML

title: Minesweeper
description: A single-player puzzle the goal is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them

title: Pac Man
description: The player controls a character through an enclosed maze, trying to collect all coins without the ghosts(shaped like '@') killing it

title: Eat the ball
description: The player controls a character through a board. To win the game the player needs to eat all the balls in the board

title: Book Shop
description: Book Shop that allows the user to read, create, edit and delete books
